249:4: bodhisattvaḥ kila sālabakulapiyālahintālatamālanaktamālavidulaniculakṣipabahule śiṃśapātiniśaśamīpalāśaśākakuśavaṃśaśaravaṇagahane kadambasarjārjunadhavakhadirakuṭajanicite vividhavallīpratānāvaguṇṭhitabahutaruviṭape rurupṛṣatasṛmaracamaragajagavaya mahiṣahariṇanyaṅkuvarāhadvīpitarakṣuvyāghravṛkasiṃharkṣādimṛgavicarite manuṣyasaṃpātavirahite mahatyaraṇyavanapradeśe tatpakāñcanojjvalavarṇaḥ sukumāraromā nānāvidhapadmarāgendranīlamarakatavaiḍūryaruciravarṇabinduvidyotitavicitragātraḥ snigdhābhinīlavimalavipulanayano manīmayairivāparuṣaprabhairviṣāṇakṣurapradeśaiḥ paramadarśanīyarūpo ratnākara iva pādacārī rurumṛgo babhūva|
249:5: sa jānānaḥ svasya vapuṣo'tilobhanīyatāṃ tanukāruṇyatāṃ ca janasya nirjanasaṃpāteṣu vanagahaneṣvabhireme,
249:6: paṭuvijñānatvācca tatra tatra vyādhajanaviracitāni yantrakūṭavāgurāpāśāvapātalepakāṣṭhanivāpabhojanāni samyak pariharannanugāminaṃ ca mṛgasārthamavabodhayannācārya iva piteva ca mṛgāṇāmādhipatyaṃ cakāra|
249:8: svahitānveṣiṇi jane kutra nāma na pūjyate||1||
249:9: atha sa kadācinmahātmā tasmin vanagahane vāsopagatastatsamīpavāhinyā navāmbupurṇayā mahavegayā nadyā hriyamāṇasya puruṣasyākranditaśabdaṃ śuśrāva|
249:11: abhidhāvata dīnavatsalāḥ kṛpaṇaṃ tārayituṃ javena mām||2||
249:13: na ca gādhamavāpyate kvacittadayaṃ māṃ samayo'bhidhāvitum||3||
249:14: atha bodhisattvastena tasya karuṇenākranditaśabdena hṛdiva samabhihanyamāno mā bhairmā bhairiti janmaśatābhyastāṃ bhayaviṣādadainyaśramāpanodinīmāmreḍitābhiniṣpīḍitaspaṣṭapadāmuccairmānuṣīṃ vācaṃ visṛjaṃstasmādvanagahanādviniṣpapāt|
249:15: dūrata eva ca taṃ puruṣamiṣṭamivopāyanamānīyamānaṃ salilaughena dadarśa|
249:17: sa tāṃ nadīṃ bhīmarayāṃ jagāhevimokṣobhayan vīra ivārisenām||4||
249:18: āvṛtya mārga vapuṣātha tasya māmāśrayasveti tamabhyuvāca|
249:25: gaccheti taṃ sa visasarja nivedya mārgam||7||
249:26: atha sa puruṣaḥ snigdhabāndhavasuhṛjjanadurlabhena tena tasyādbhutenābhyupapattisaumukheyan samāvarjitahṛdayastayā cāsya rūpaśobhayā samutthāpyamānavismayabahumānaḥ praṇamyainaṃ tattatpriyamuvāca-
249:28: nālaṃ kartumidaṃ karma madarthe yatkṛtaṃ tvayā || 8 ||
249:34: na citrarūpā sujane kṛtajñatā nisargasiddhaiva hi tasya sā sthitiḥ|
249:35: jagattu dṛṣṭvā samudīrṇavikriyaṃ kṛtajñatāpyadya guṇeṣu gaṇyate||11||
249:36: yatastvāṃ bravīmi kṛtamidamanusmaratā bhavatā nāyamarthaḥ kasmaicinnivedyaḥ īdṛśenāsmi sattvaviśeṣeṇottārita iti|
249:47: sa tatheti pratiśrutya praṇamya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ca taṃ mahāsattvaṃ svagṛhamabhyajagāma|
249:48: tena khalu samayena tatrānyatamasya rājño devī satyasvapnā babhūva|
249:51: sā kathācinnidrāvaśamupagatā pratyuṣasamaye svapnaṃ paśyati sma sarvaratnasamāhāramiva śriyā jvalantaṃ siṃhāsanasthaṃ rurumṛgaṃ sarājikayā parṣadā parivṛtaṃ vispaṣṭākṣarapadanyasena mānuṣeṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayantam|
249:52: vismayā kṣiptahṛdayā ca bhartuḥ prabodhapaṭahadhvaninā saha sā vyabudhyata|
249:56: nivedya ca taṃ svapnātiśayaṃ rājñe sādaraṃ punaruvāca-
249:57: tatsādhu tāvatkiryatāṃ mṛgasya tasyopalambhaṃ prati deva yatnaḥ|
249:58: antaḥpuraṃ ratnamṛgeṇa tena tārāmṛgeṇeva nabho virājet||15||
249:59: atha sa rājā dṛṣṭapratyayastasyāḥ svapnadarśanasya pratigṛhya tadvacanaṃ tatpriyakāmyayā ratnamṛgādhigamalobhācca tasya mṛgasyānveṣaṇārthaṃ sarvaṃ vyādhagaṇaṃ samādideśa|
249:65: atha sa puruṣastāṃ ghoṣaṇāṃ punaḥ punarupaśrutya-
249:78: iti niścitamatirvismṛtya taṃ rurumṛgasyopakāraṃ samupetya rājānamuvāca-ahaṃ deva taṃ mṛgavaramadhivāsaṃ cāsya jānāmi|
249:80: tacchrutvā sa rājā pramuditamanāḥ-mamaivainaṃ bhadra pradarśayetyuktvā mṛgayāprayāṇānurūpaṃ veṣamāsthāya mahatā balakāyena parivṛtaḥ puravarānnirgamya tena puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastaṃ nadītīramupajagāma|
249:81: parikṣipya ca tadvanagahanaṃ samagreṇa balakāyena dhanvī hastāvāpi vyavasitāptapuruṣaparivṛtaḥ sa rājā tenaiva puruṣeṇādeśyamānamārgastadvanagahanamanupraviveśa|
249:82: atha sa puruṣastaṃ rurumṛgaṃ viśvastasthitamālokya pradarśayāmāsa rājñe-ayamayaṃ deva sa mṛgavaraḥ|
249:89: atha sa rājā tatpradarśitena mārgeṇa rurusaṃdarśanakutūhale nayane vicikṣepa|
249:91: guṇairuruṃ taṃ sa ruruṃ dadarśa śātahnadaṃ vahnimivābhramakṣe||20||
249:94: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato janakolāhalamupaśrutya vyaktaṃ samantātparivṛtto'smīti niścitamatirvyaddhukāmamupārūḍhaṃ cāvetya rājānaṃ nāyamapayānakāla iti viditvā viśadapadākṣareṇa mānuṣeṇa vacasā rājānamābabhāṣe-
249:98: asāvatra mṛgo'stīti ko nu te māṃ nyavedayat||23||
249:99: atha sa rājā tasyādbhūtena mānuṣeṇābhivyāhāreṇa bhṛśataramāvarjitahṛdayastamasmai puruṣaṃ śarāgreṇa nirdideśa-ayamasyātyadbhutasya no darśayiteti|
249:100: atha bodhisattvastaṃ puruṣaṃ pratyabhijñāya vigarhamāṇa uvāca-kaṣṭaṃ bhoḥ|
249:105: atha sa rājā kiṃ nu khalvayamevaṃ vijugupsata iti samutpannakautūhalaḥ sāvegastaṃ rurumuvāca-
249:111: nāyaṃ vigarhādara eva rājan kutsārhametattvavagamya karma|
249:112: nāyaṃ punaḥ kartumiti vyavasyettīkṣṇākṣaraṃ tena mayaivamuktam||28||
249:113: ko hi kṣate kṣāramivāvasiñced rūkṣākṣaraṃ viskhaliteṣu vākyam|
249:114: priye tu putre'pi cikitsakasya pravartate vyādhivaśāccikitsā||29||
249:116: tato bhayaṃ māṃ nṛvaredamāgataṃ na khalvasatsaṃgatamasti bhūtaye||30||
249:117: atha sa rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ tīkṣṇayā dṛṣṭyā nirbhartsanarūkṣamavekṣyovāca-satyamare re purā tvamanenaivamāpanno'bhyuddhṛta iti ?
249:118: atha sa puruṣaḥ samāpatitabhayaviṣādasvedavaivarṇyadainyo hrīmandaṃ satyamityavocat|
249:119: atha sa rājā dhik tvāmityenamavabhartysayan dhanuṣi śaraṃ saṃdhāyābravīt-mā tāvadbhoḥ !
249:120: evaṃvidhenāpi pariśrameṇa mṛdūkṛtaṃ yasya na nāma cetaḥ|
249:123: atha bodhisattvaḥ karuṇayā mahatyā samuparudhyamānahṛdayastadantarā sthitvā rājānamuvāca-alamalaṃ mahārāja hataṃ hatvā|
249:125: hatastadeveha yaśaḥparikṣayād dhruvaṃ paratrāpi ca dharmasaṃkṣayāt||32||
249:128: ataḥ kṛpāmatra kurūṣva mā ruṣaṃ yadīpsitaṃ caivamanena kiṃcana|
249:129: kiruṣva tenainamavandhyasāhasaṃ sthitaṃ tvadājñāpravaṇaṃ hi me śiraḥ||34||
249:130: atha sa rājā tena tasyāpakāriṇyapi sadayatvenākṛtakena ca tatpratyupakārādareṇa paramavismitamatirjātaprasādaḥ sabahumānamudīkṣamāṇastaṃ ruruvaramuvāca-sādhu sādhu mahābhāga !
249:133: yenānukampyastu tavaiṣa jālmo hetuśca naḥ sajjanadarśanasya|
249:136: tadājñāpaya yāvadiha saṃgamanaprayojanena tavopayogaṃ gacchāma iti|
249:137: atha sa rājā taṃ ruruṃ gurumiva rathavaramāropya mahatā satkāreṇa puravaraṃ praveśya kṛtātithisatkāraṃ mahati siṃhāsane niveśya samutsāhayamānaḥ sāntaḥpuro'mātyagaṇaparivṛtaḥ prītibahumānasaumyamudīkṣamāṇo dharmaṃ papraccha-
249:138: dharmaṃ prati manuṣyāṇāṃ bahudhā buddhayo gatāḥ|
249:139: niścayastava dharme tu yathā taṃ vaktumarhasi||37||
249:140: atha bodhisattvastasya rājñaḥ saparṣatkasya sphuṭamadhuracitrākṣareṇa vacasā dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa-
249:141: dayāṃ sattveṣu manye'haṃ dharmaṃ saṃkṣepato nṛpa|
249:144: ātmanīva dayā syāccetsvajane vā yathā jane|
249:149: suvṛṣṭiriva sasyāni guṇān sā hi prasūyate||41||
249:151: śucau tasmin vāṇī vrajati vikṛtaṃ naiva ca tanuḥ|
249:155: dayāvān viśvāsyo bhavati jagatāṃ bāndhava iva|
249:158: saṃkṣepeṇa dayāmataḥ sthiratayā paśyanti dharmaṃ buddhāḥ
249:159: ko nāmāsti guṇaḥ sa sādhudayito yo nānuyāto dayām|
249:160: tasmātputra ivātmanīva ca dayāṃ nītvā prakarṣaṃ jane
249:162: atha sa rājā samabhinandya tattasya vacanaṃ sayaurajānapado dharmaparāyaṇo babhūva|
